isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

paused().return: true if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

payments(address).details: Returns the credit owed to an address.

params._celerValue: Potential celer value for bidding, it can be larger than actual celer value
params._hash: Hash calculated from desired rate, value, celerValue and salt

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._commitmentId: Commitment Id in PoLC belong to the sender
params._salt: A random value used for hash

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

challengeWinners(uint256,address[]).notice: A potential winner, who is not claimed as one of the winners, is able to challenge the auction during the challenge period

claimWinners(uint256,address[]).notice: The auction asker claims winners for the auction during the claim period

collectCollateral(uint256).notice: Collect the collateral of the auction if lending is not repaid

drainToken(address,uint256).notice: Onwer drains one type of tokens when the contract is paused

finalizeAuction(uint256).notice: Finalize the auction by withdrawing money from PoLC commitments during finalize period

finalizeBid(uint256).notice: Finalize the bid for bidders, who are not selected as winners, or the asker fails to finalize the auction before finalize period

placeBid(uint256,bytes32,uint256).notice: Bid for an auction during the bidding period. If called more than once, it will update the existing bid for the sender. However, when the bid is updated, the previous Celer value will be forfeited

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

repayAuction(uint256).notice: Repay the auction with original assets and interests after lending ends It will send collateral back to asker if there is any

revealBid(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Reveal the bid of current user for an auction during the revealing period. It will calculate hash based on rate, value, celer value, and salt, and check if it is same as the hash provided in the bidding period. It will also check if commitment in PoLC has enough fund

updateSupportedToken(address,bool).notice: Update a token in the supported list

userdoc.notice: Contract allows service providers to send assets stored in PoLC through auction.
